Job Description: Exp. required: 3-6 Yrs     Candidate should have minimum 3-6 yrs overall experience.   Candidate should have worked on C#, .Net framework, .Net Core, Web API, REST, ASP.Net and other latest .Net offerings.   Strong Database skills on SQL Server or related technologies.   Experience of working with large data applications/products.   Candidates with Angular, ODATA, WCF and PowerShell skills preferred.   Strong problem solving and reasoning skills.   Good communication.
